thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses USA | www.smartbuyglasses.com | 5 of 160
thread.title: Sunfleck

author: Sunfleck
title: Sunfleck
text: I got a pair of brand-name frames with progressive bifocal lenses for less than the frames alone would have cost at the store near me. They also had a color that I couldn't find anywhere else. Shipping took a little longer than I'd expected and the glasses don't fit perfectly, but for the price it's worth going elsewhere to have them adjusted. I'd use this site again.
